The individual components of the plant will be provided with CE marking, if applicable. However, the complete evaporation plant will not be provided with CE marking, neither according to PED nor according to machine directive:
Evaporators (heat exchangers) are no machines in terms of article 2.a), first dash.
An evaporation plant is no entity of machines in terms of article 2.a), fourth dash.
There is no pressure equipment in GEA´s scope. So GEA is not allowed to provide a CE marking for the plant
